des:
Welcome to ¶City, an innovative text-based RPG/city-building simulation that combines the depth of strategic urban planning with the immersive storytelling of a role-playing adventure. In this game, you step into the shoes of a city planner and mayor, tasked with the monumental responsibility of constructing and managing a thriving metropolis in a dynamic virtual world.

The setting of ¶City is richly detailed, offering players a fantasy environment reminiscent of the whimsical and satirical style found in Terry Pratchett's Discworld series. As you delve into the game, you'll encounter colorful characters, quirky narratives, and witty dialogue that adds a layer of charm and humor to your city-building experience.

One of the key aspects that sets ¶City apart is its emphasis on player exploration and experimentation. Rather than relying solely on pre-defined gameplay mechanics, the game encourages you to uncover its intricacies through hands-on interaction. With more than 8,000 words of descriptive text, each decision you make and every building you construct contributes to the evolving narrative of your city.

The gameplay mechanics draw inspiration from classic city-building simulations like SimCity 3 and 4, offering a familiar yet refreshing approach to urban planning. You'll have access to a diverse range of buildings, each with its own unique effects and functionalities. From residential zones to commercial districts, industrial complexes to cultural landmarks, every structure plays a crucial role in shaping the growth and prosperity of your virtual realm.

Navigating ¶City is intuitive, thanks to its user-friendly interface and interactive elements. If you ever feel overwhelmed or uncertain about your next move, the game provides helpful cues and reprompts. You can reveal additional information or seek assistance by saying "HELP" at any point during your gameplay journey. Whether you're a seasoned city builder or a newcomer to the genre, ¶City offers a welcoming and accessible experience for players of all backgrounds.

Exploring the mechanics of ¶City is a rewarding journey filled with discovery and strategic planning. As you interact with NPCs, manage resources, and make pivotal decisions, you'll witness the evolution of your cityscape and the impact of your choices on its inhabitants. Whether you prioritize economic growth, cultural development, or environmental sustainability, the dynamic nature of the game ensures that every playthrough offers a unique and engaging experience.

To enhance your understanding of the game mechanics and uncover hidden strategies, ¶City provides a tutorial for guidance. However, the true joy of playing lies in embracing the spirit of exploration and experimentation. Dive into the world of ¶City, unleash your creativity, and watch as your virtual city transforms into a vibrant and thriving community under your leadership.

Are you ready to embark on a text-based adventure unlike any other? Click here to start playing ¶City and begin your journey as a visionary city planner and mayor in this captivating simulation RPG.

¶City was created by Sophie Kirschner for a Ludum Dare. She has generously licensed her code for the audio port of the game.
